Opening of the Presentation.description: Introduce the audience to the presentation on the History of OpenAI, highlighting the aim to explore its foundation, milestones, and future.

Founding and Mission.description: Detail the founding of OpenAI, including its inception by key figures and its initial nonprofit mission.

Development Milestones.description: Discuss the early developments and contributions of OpenAI in AI research, highlighting notable publications and tools like OpenAI Gym.

Commercial Transition and Achievements.description: Explore OpenAI's transition to a 'capped' for-profit model, the landmark GPT Model series, and its strategic partnership with Microsoft.

Ending of the Presentation.description: Conclude the presentation with recent developments in AI research at OpenAI and its visionary plans for the future.
